item.title: Hyperbole use cases
item.description: Typical Hyperbole applications include: Personal Information Management Overlapping link paths provide a variety of views into an information space. A single key press activates buttons regardless of their types, making navigation easy. A search facility locates buttons in context and permits quick selection. Documentation Browsing Embedding cross-references in a favorite documentation format. Addition of a point-and-click interface to existing documentation. Linkage of code and design documents. Jumping to the definition of an identifier from its use within code or its reference within documentation.

item.title: Hyperbole
item.description: Hyperbole Hyperbole is an efficient, programmable hypertextual information management system. Hyperbole does not enforce any specific information management model rather allows you to organize information how you see fit. Includes: Hypertextual buttons Hierarchical, record based contact maanger rapid window and frame control system multi-level auto-numbered outliner Hypertext buttons can be embedded within files and other types. Offers Keyboard and mouse-based control of information with multiple windows Has point and click access to URLS, manuals archives etc Hyperbole consists of five parts:
